messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: Re:"It takes a village"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/31/2000 6:57:30 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... are ... I like this description of it takes a village .  Sign me up!  Sounds like the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/31/2000 6:57:30 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
earthmagik@... writes:

> My philosophy on this topic is that we build our own villages of family &
> friends, and they are in fact also teachers of us & our children..as we ,
> adults & children , alike, also are teachers of them & theirs.and that we
are
> all learning everyday from the people we trust & care about. SO this would
> be a "it takes a village to raise a child" mentality, that I am proud of
> as these people I have chosen to be in our lives are there for a reason.
> They model our values, and they care for us.
>

I like this description of 'it takes a village'. Sign me up! Sounds like
the village I'm trying to develop for my family.

Thanks,
Eiraul
